TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_Ma-te-li, title = Ma-te-li, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ma-te-li} }

S.FORM: == kakiliman == Ma-te-li "Si-pang-ya a kamu, Madrid Si-pang-ya a kamu pangiha (ma'ðɾið) )nu Si-pang-ya angangan atukuy atu satabakiay a tukay, nu Ma-te-li saayaway a cen-hu nu satekeday a kitizaan, u kitizaan tini i Si-pang-ya teban nu kanatal a lala', Man-say-na-lye-s-a sa'wac panasul tu tukay. tukuyay a tademaw pakala tu 340 emang, kitizaan a tukayay a tademaw pakala tu 627.1 emang "2010 a mihcaan", palalecad macalap ku Si-pang-ya. 馬德里(西班牙語:Madrid,西班牙語發音:(ma'ðɾið) ) . knilaculan nipatizang tu tukay i 90 se-ci, i Muw-al tapiingan nu mapapacakayan a "Ma-ke-li-te" malumanay a kitizaan nu malahday a tukay, 1561 a mihcaan, Si-pang-ya a hungti ci Beo-li al-se angangana tukuy makay Tow-lye-tow malimad tayni, uyza micidek kakitizaan a kalamkam malahad, mala zikuz nu Si-pang-ya nu midebung hungti a kanatal nu kapulungan nu sapiculu' tu tuud, ayza nu Pa-say-long-na palalecad Si-pang-ya nu tusaay patahkal tu lalangawan a sacumud. tusa ku sakay hekalay a sasingalan nu lalangawan 兩大對外文化窗口. Ma-te-li atu capiay nisakaput tu Ma-te-li tabakiay tukay a kitizaan nu Ow-mung sakatulu nu tabakiay a tukuy nu kezayay, uyni dada' i Pa-li atu Mi-lan. Ma-te-li tusa i kitakit ku singangayay nu mitikuda tu mali a kasaupuan, hungtu a luma' Ma-te-li atu Ma-te-li nikasedsed tu nalimaan. namahini. i nikauzi a palalecad, kezay tahkal ku nisanga'an atu icibaay ku nitabaki, Ma-te-li nu timul a Ow atu I-pi-li a kasubal nu kahenulan nu kanakalay a gingku nu kitizaan, namahini nu Ow-cow atu La-tin-mey-coway nu angangan nu sapisuwbay a zazan, . hatu nu Si-pang-ya labuay nu kanatal a kusi nu pulung patizeng i Ma-te-li, mahiniay Si-pang-ya patelayay,kanatal a pahikukian a sakaput atu Si-pang-ya kanatal simal a kusian. zuma migingkiway a sakaput, mahiniay u Si-pang-ya hungti a luma' kamu a sye-yen atu Sey-wan-ti-s si-yen, zuma kanatal a sakaput, mahiniay pulungay a kanatal tungusay nu kitakit nu miliwkuay a sakaput "UNWTO" atu I-pi-li Mey-cow kanatal a sakaput "OEI" patizang tu cong-pu i Ma-te-li. ayzaay tu a mihcaan, masasumaay a lalangawan mikawaw i Ma-te-li malingatu palahad. angangan iza ku Si-pang-ya kanatal miliwkuay macacaka tu tuud a huy "FITUR",kucungay pipaazihan huy "ARCO", Ma-te-li patahkal paazih tu tyen-naw "SIMO TCI" atu Ma-te-li paazih tu zikuz. 近年, (FITUR),藝術博覽會(ARCO),馬德里電腦展(SIMO TCI)和馬德里時裝周. uyza i cen-ce,pasubana', pibalakasan, hekal, katuuday nu pahusuay, zikuc, ke-sye, lalangawan atu nalimaan u kahenulan kuyni, Ma-te-li mala u kanatal nu tabakiay a tukuy. duduc stu Monocle a zyasi 2017 a mihcaan pasiluc tu ngangan, Ma-te-li maala i kitakit u sakapahay a enengan a tukay tu saka 10 a nganga. Ma-te-li nu Si-pang-ya miliwkuay a tademaw u sakatusa a tukay, uynicacay I Pa-say-low-na. kanahatu izaw ku nu ayzaay a nisanga'an tu saidang, nika mahiza kapah Maliwan tu yadah ku ni likisi a sanga'an tu luma'. Si-pey-lay-s a putah atu mipesay tu nanum mahiza mala nu Ma-te-li tu a bacu. kanahatu ayzaay a Ma-te-li a kitizaan i ayaw nu nisulitan tu likisi a ziday izaw tu ku tademaw mauzip, nika Low-ma hungti kanatal a ziday Ma-te-li u tungus i Complutum a kiwkayan " ayzaay a Ay-na-lye-s-pow". nika makayniay Ma-te-li nu saayaway likisi a nisulitan u nu 9 se-ciay, Mu-han-mu-te cacay a lasubu a mihcaan pasakamu ayzaay Ma-te-li hungti a luma' a kitizaan m ipatizeng tu cacay adidi'ay a hungti a luma'. Complutum教區 之內. .

== kakiliman == Ma-te-li "Si-pang-ya a kamo, Madrid Si-pang-ya a kamo pangiha (ma'ðɾið) )no Si-pang-ya angangan atokoy ato satabakiay a tokay, no Ma-te-li saayaway a cen-ho no satekeday a kitizaan, o kitizaan tini i Si-pang-ya teban no kanatal a lala', Man-say-na-lye-s-a sa'wac panasol to tokay. tokoyay a tademaw pakala to 340 emang, kitizaan a tokayay a tademaw pakala to 627.1 emang "2010 a mihcaan", palalecad macalap ko Si-pang-ya. 馬德里(西班牙語:Madrid,西班牙語發音:(ma'ðɾið) ) . knilacolan nipatizang to tokay i 90 se-ci, i Mow-al tapiingan no mapapacakayan a "Ma-ke-li-te" malomanay a kitizaan no malahday a tokay, 1561 a mihcaan, Si-pang-ya a hongti ci Beo-li al-se angangana tokoy makay Tow-lye-tow malimad tayni, oyza micidek kakitizaan a kalamkam malahad, mala zikoz no Si-pang-ya no midebong hongti a kanatal no kapolongan no sapicolo' to tood, ayza no Pa-say-long-na palalecad Si-pang-ya no tosaay patahkal to lalangawan a sacomod. tosa ko sakay hekalay a sasingalan no lalangawan 兩大對外文化窗口. Ma-te-li ato capiay nisakapot to Ma-te-li tabakiay tokay a kitizaan no Ow-mong sakatolo no tabakiay a tokoy no kezayay, oyni dada' i Pa-li ato Mi-lan. Ma-te-li tosa i kitakit ko singangayay no mitikoda to mali a kasaopoan, hongto a loma' Ma-te-li ato Ma-te-li nikasedsed to nalimaan. namahini. i nikaozi a palalecad, kezay tahkal ko nisanga'an ato icibaay ko nitabaki, Ma-te-li no timol a Ow ato I-pi-li a kasobal no kahenolan no kanakalay a gingko no kitizaan, namahini no Ow-cow ato La-tin-mey-coway no angangan no sapisowbay a zazan, . hato no Si-pang-ya laboay no kanatal a kosi no polong patizeng i Ma-te-li, mahiniay Si-pang-ya patelayay,kanatal a pahikokian a sakapot ato Si-pang-ya kanatal simal a kosian. zoma migingkiway a sakapot, mahiniay o Si-pang-ya hongti a loma' kamo a sye-yen ato Sey-wan-ti-s si-yen, zoma kanatal a sakapot, mahiniay polongay a kanatal tongosay no kitakit no miliwkoay a sakapot "UNWTO" ato I-pi-li Mey-cow kanatal a sakapot "OEI" patizang to cong-po i Ma-te-li. ayzaay to a mihcaan, masasomaay a lalangawan mikawaw i Ma-te-li malingato palahad. angangan iza ko Si-pang-ya kanatal miliwkoay macacaka to tood a hoy "FITUR",kocongay pipaazihan hoy "ARCO", Ma-te-li patahkal paazih to tyen-naw "SIMO TCI" ato Ma-te-li paazih to zikoz. 近年, (FITUR),藝術博覽會(ARCO),馬德里電腦展(SIMO TCI)和馬德里時裝周. oyza i cen-ce,pasobana', pibalakasan, hekal, katooday no pahosoay, zikoc, ke-sye, lalangawan ato nalimaan o kahenolan koyni, Ma-te-li mala o kanatal no tabakiay a tokoy. dodoc sto Monocle a zyasi 2017 a mihcaan pasiloc to ngangan, Ma-te-li maala i kitakit o sakapahay a enengan a tokay to saka 10 a nganga. Ma-te-li no Si-pang-ya miliwkoay a tademaw o sakatosa a tokay, oynicacay I Pa-say-low-na. kanahato izaw ko no ayzaay a nisanga'an to saidang, nika mahiza kapah Maliwan to yadah ko ni likisi a sanga'an to loma'. Si-pey-lay-s a potah ato mipesay to nanom mahiza mala no Ma-te-li to a baco. kanahato ayzaay a Ma-te-li a kitizaan i ayaw no nisolitan to likisi a ziday izaw to ko tademaw maozip, nika Low-ma hongti kanatal a ziday Ma-te-li o tongos i Complotom a kiwkayan " ayzaay a Ay-na-lye-s-pow". nika makayniay Ma-te-li no saayaway likisi a nisolitan o no 9 se-ciay, Mo-han-mo-te cacay a lasobo a mihcaan pasakamo ayzaay Ma-te-li hongti a loma' a kitizaan m ipatizeng to cacay adidi'ay a hongti a loma'. Complotom教區 之內. .
